thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Qualcomm Board Of Directors Unanimously Rejects Revised Broadcom Proposal

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Qualcomm Board Of Directors Unanimously Rejects Revised Broadcom Proposal
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Qualcomm Inc:
* QUALCOMM BOARD OF DIRECTORS UNANIMOUSLY REJECTS REVISED BROADCOM PROPOSAL
* QUALCOMM BOARD OF DIRECTORS UNANIMOUSLY REJECTS REVISED BROADCOM PROPOSAL
* QUALCOMM INC - QUALCOMM OFFERS TO MEET TO SEE IF BROADCOM CAN ADDRESS SERIOUS DEFICIENCIES IN VALUE AND CERTAINTY
* QUALCOMM INC - ‍QUALCOMM BOARD, ASSISTED BY ITS FINANCIAL AND LEGAL ADVISORS, DETERMINED THAT BROADCOM PROPOSAL MATERIALLY “UNDERVALUES” QUALCOMM​
* QUALCOMM INC - ‍BROADCOM PROPOSAL FALLS “WELL SHORT OF FIRM REGULATORY COMMITMENT” BOARD WOULD DEMAND GIVEN SIGNIFICANT DOWNSIDE RISK OF A FAILED DEAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
